channel.title: 93dcthugs93's help thread
channel.description:
Yes I am well aware there are plenty of these but I might aswell make one too :D
Just in case ;)

Ask away!

item.title: 93dcthugs93's help thread
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:36, topic:50355”][quote author=mod abyssal link=topic=70749.msg817569#msg817569 date=1169706777]
I have a client.java problem… It says 100 errors and I asked a pal and they said I must have a corrupted client, from one error which causes many errors… I want to know since your helping and all, can i send you a copy of my client and you can look at it for me?
[/quote]

Give me your error. I can fix it It’s most likely something you’ve just added.[/quote]

Also you can usually find where the error is near if you look at the top of the compiler, since thats like usually right below the error.

Read full topic

i stil don’t know how to make the screen not gray and it still won’t me

I have a client.java problem… It says 100 errors and I asked a pal and they said I must have a corrupted client, from one error which causes many errors… I want to know since your helping and all, can i send you a copy of my client and you can look at it for me?

Give me your error. I can fix it It’s most likely something you’ve just added.

item.title: 93dcthugs93's help thread
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Sorry, I just read this again. Anyways, I mean like Im adding a training place for every skill in my server. (and i dont mean using an item with another item, I mean like using a big net with the fountain for a fish. I posted a tutorial on using items with items… lol) And I made another fountain, but when I did, it didnt work, and disabled the other fountain. So I removed it. Then I added water to my place, and I wanna be able to use a big net/cage/harpoon on it for fish. So its like this. HARPOON+WATER=SHARK. Thats what I mean. Ive gotten SOOO close with it, I got 1 error.

Read full topic

item.title: 93dcthugs93's help thread
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“balance, post:25, topic:50355”]ok, i have a question.

i wanted to make a server sooo,

*downloaded source
*made static ip
*portforwarded
*set up no-ip

and when i tried to acces it with my other pc, it worked
but when i asked someone else to try, it didnt.

so i was wondering, have i forgotten anything?

i have read taharoks setting up a server guide[/quote] u cant ask those questions ere. go to development and help section and ask there. see what ppl say.

Read full topic

item.title: 93dcthugs93's help thread
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

[quote=“ninjasod, post:21, topic:50355”]I know you’re offline but you’ll come back.

I meant if you knew how to make spells need runes for another source, I could change the code so that it works for my source.

Sorry for the confusion :)[/quote]

No not off the top of my head, I could figure it out though. Earlier you said ^^ you might change sources so… Your sticking with pimpscape right?

Lin:

How do I make it when I use an Item with an Object, I get another object? As in fishing+cooking? (I tried to make a bunch of times, and what should be the proper way, but I always get 1 error. Check my question “How do I make it when I use…” for a layout on how I make it)

What items? On every server I’m pretty sure when you use say… a tinder box with a log you get bows but fishing & cooking… umm I don’t quite understand, You wont get anything?

I guess you could make it give you something pretty easy though. I’ll check out your topic…

Read full topic

@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Yes, you can change the code for it to work I’m sure. So you want to know if theres a source that makes you need runes to cast spells?

Try testscape or project 16.

& g o d, no it’s not frustrating me. If I thought I couldn’t handle questions I wouldn’t have made this thread.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

There are server advertisements, if thats what your asking for. Thats what I’m understanding, If I’m wrong feel free to say so.

Read full topic
